WASHINGTON | May 9, 2007
Senate Votes to Give F.D.A. Sweeping New Powers
By ROBERT PEAR
The bill gives the F.D.A. new power to police drug safety and order changes in drug labels.

http://www.nytimes.com/2007/05/09/washington/09cnd-drug.html?ex=1179374400&en=ab5f21d03b4afde0&ei=5070&emc=eta1
